title.rendered: Sydney vs Perth, Australian T20 League 2022: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Tips

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Sydney: Matthew Gilkes (wk), Alex Hales, Sam Whiteman, Oliver Davies, Alex Ross, Daniel Sams, Ben Cutting, Nathan McAndrew, Chris Green (c), Brendan Doggett, Usman Qadir

Perth: Cameron Bancroft, Stephen Eskinazi, Aaron Hardie, Josh Inglis (wk), Ashton Turner (c), Nick Hobson, Ashton Agar, Matthew Kelly, Andrew Tye, Jason Behrendorff, Peter Hatzoglou

Pitch Report

Venue: Sydney Showground Stadium, Sydney

(Based on the last 2 games)

1st innings average score: 130

2nd innings average score: 113

Wickets per innings: 6

Type: Balanced

Weather: Slightly cloudy but no rain forecast for the day

Wins

Batting 1st: 50%

Batting 2nd: 50%

Fantasy Tips of the Day

Of the 25 wickets that fell in the last 2 games, only 4 belonged to the spinners. The pacers, otherwise, have exploited the bounce to their benefit.

Daniel Sams’ bowling figures at the venue read 2 for 23 and 2 for 27.

Cameron Bancroft is the highest run-scorer (275 runs at 55) in the contests between these teams. In the bowling department, Jason Behrendorff tops the list: 14 wickets in 10 games.

In the previous game between these teams, Oliver Davies was the captain of the Ultimate Team for smashing 58 off 47, grabbing 2 catches, and inflicting 2 run outs. Meanwhile, with 61 runs and 2 catches to his name, Ashton Turner was the vice-captain.

Although Sydney boast quality all-rounders, their bowlers are thin on numbers. On the other hand, Perth has a variety of bowlers at their disposal, but their batters have been inconsistent.
